attributes.action: Block the sale of the land purchased for HS2
attributes.additional_details: It is in the national interest to have projects that will develop infrastructure for long term economic growth in the face of the incursion of China into our manufacturing base
attributes.background: Accept that this is a national asset and national infrastructure would be improved when the funds become available to develop the economic infrastructure of the north

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648150
